XApplications

As a part of the project different users will need to use several applications to achieve the desired outcome. These applications need to be added and applied to the different users as well as groups. The XApplications entity will be used to create the necessary data for the different application

Adding new applications

To add new applications that you would need for different users of your project

1. Select the XApplications entity. The xapplications list window is displayed.

2. Select Add. The Add xapplications window is displayed.

3. Enter Name and Description for the specific application. These fields are mandatory.

4. Click Save. The new application is now added to your project.

Deleting applications

If any application is to be removed, you can delete it from the list using the Delete function.

To delete an application:

1. Under XApplications list, click to select the application to be deleted.

2. Click Delete. The selected application is deleted. Select multiple applications from the list if you need to delete simultaneously.

Note:

1. In case you do not select an application , an error message is displayed stating “XApplication not selected”.

Editing applications

You can edit the details for a specific application like the name and description as well as keys, groups and roles.

  1. Keys: Every application has a unique key. You can use the Edit function to add the Key details.
    1. To add key details, click XApplication >Edit .
    2. Select Keys and click Add.
    3. Enter Name, Description and Secret.
    4. Click Save. The key details for the application are added.
  2. Application XGroups: The different group of users will have right to access different applications. This relation can be assigned using the Edit function.
    1. To add Group details, click XApplication > Edit.
    2. Select Application XGroups, a list of groups is provided.
    3. Select one of the groups and click Add. Needs to be verified
    4. Click Save. The key details for the application are added.

Refresh

For all entities you will be able to Refresh that page to reflect the latest data and functions applicable for the entity.
